DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Presence Hangover Effect Healthy Adults After Administration Songha® Night Tablets
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female Caucasian subject age 2060 year Normal outcome Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index ( PSQI ) , mean +2 Standard Deviation ( SDs ) No manifest sleep disorder diagnose polysomnography Normal pupillary function Willing able give write informed consent accordance Good Clinical Practice ( GCP ) local legislation prior participation study able perform study full time period 36 day Subjective sleep duration le 3 hour night test Caffeine , nicotine alcohol day ( midnight ) test Alcohol consumption even visit 3 , 5 7 Eyedrops drug , take orally intravenously , influence pupil size motility Shift work Drug alcohol abuse Use psychoactive drug past 30 day Any treatment might interfere evaluation test drug Any drug know interact benzodiazepine relate drug , e.g . antiepileptic , antihistaminics , muscle relaxant drug , antihypertensive drug , drug inhibit cytochrome P450 Any serious disorder might interfere his/her participation study evaluation efficacy safety test drug ( e.g . renal insufficiency , hepatic metabolic dysfunction , cardiovascular disease , psychiatric disorder , myasthenia gravis , delirious state , etc . ) Known hypersensitivity ingredient study drug Pregnant nursing woman inadequate birth control method ( applies female childbearing potential ) Participation another trial within past 30 day
